text: Don Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla International Airport or Guadalajara International Airport, is an airport in Guadalajara, Mexico. It opened in 1966. ==Airlines== These are the airlines that go to Guadalajara Airport: *Aeromar *Aerom√©xico (hub) *Alaska Airlines *American Airlines *Copa Airlines *Delta Air Lines *Delta Connection *Interjet *Magnicharters *TAR *United Airlines *United Express *VivaAerobus (hub) *Volaris (hub) ==References== Category:Guadalajara Category:Airports in Mexico Category:Transport in Mexico Category:1966 establishments in North America Category:1960s establishments in Mexico
title: Don Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla International Airport
